lines.text: Psst over here hey you looking for a good deal yeah I got four new retreads, got a new paint job and a complete motor overhaul.

Don't pay attention to that oil clunker its got a clean engine but a leaky rear end. If you want a real cream puff come on by. And don't pay any attention to the price tag, I can be had for a lot less. You dig? Ah haha.
